DOC.brief_summary: To study safety , tolerance , pharmacokinetics , anti-HIV effect PMEA ( adefovir ) administer daily intravenous ( IV ) and/or subcutaneous ( SC ) injection patient advance HIV disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Study Safety , Tolerance , Pharmacokinetics 9- ( 2-Phosphonylmethoxyethyl ) Adenine ( PMEA ; Adefovir ) Patients With Advanced HIV Disease .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive single IV SC dose PMEA daily 4 week . A maximum tolerated dose define regimen .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Other antiretroviral therapy IF stable dose least 4 week prior study entry . Prophylactic therapy aerosolize pentamidine , oral trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole ( Bactrim , Septra ) dapsone , fluconazole ketoconazole IF stable prophylactic regimen least 4 week prior study entry . Patients must : HIV seropositivity . Elevated p24 antigen ( > 40 pg/ml ) . Mean CD4 count < = 100 cells/mm3 . Life expectancy least 3 month . Prior Medication : Allowed : Other prior antiretroviral therapy . Prophylactic therapy aerosolize pentamidine , oral trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole ( Bactrim , Septra ) dapsone , fluconazole ketoconazole . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Inadequate venous access . Active serious infection ( HIV infection ) require parenteral antibiotic therapy . Clinically significant cardiac disease , include symptom ischemia , congestive heart failure , arrhythmia . Psychiatric disturbance illness may affect compliance . Malignancy Kaposi 's sarcoma . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Investigational agent stavudine ( d4T ) . Interferonalpha . Ganciclovir . Foscarnet . Diuretics . Amphotericin B. Aminoglycoside antibiotic . Other nephrotoxic agent . Acyclovir dose > = 2 g/day . Prior Medication : Excluded within 2 week prior study entry : Investigational agent stavudine ( d4T ) . Interferonalpha . Ganciclovir . Foscarnet . Diuretics . Amphotericin B. Aminoglycoside antibiotic . Other nephrotoxic agent . Excluded within 4 week prior study entry : Systemic therapy Kaposi 's sarcoma . Substance abuse .
